title: Elementary teachers return to bargaining table with province Wednesday - CTV News
description: Elementary teachers return to bargaining table with province Wednesday CTV News Ontario elementary teachers returning to bargaining table Toronto Sun Ontario elementary teachers to resume bargaining on Wednesday Global News PICKEL: The case against bigger rai…
content: TORONTO Ontario s elementary teachers are set to resume contract talks with the government on Wednesday but they re warning that if bargaining doesn t produce an agreement the union will resume job action after March break Elementary Teachers Fed chars
